Mild Taco Seasoning


Ingredients
3 tablespoons chili powder
2 tablespoon paprika
1 tablespoon ground cumin
1 tablespoon garlic
2 teaspoons dried oregano
1 teaspoon coriander
1 teaspoon black pepper
1 teaspoon salt

Cooking Instructions

Mix seasonings together and store in an airtight container.
Use 2 tablespoons to season1 pound of chicken or other meat.
Source 

https://www.allrecipes.com/mild-taco-seasoning-recipe-8384097 

Reference Video 

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=Mild Taco Seasoning
